Synopsis: Dick and Rachel, a girl possessed by a strange darkness, get embroiled in a conspiracy that could bring Hell on Earth. Joining them along the way are the hot-headed Starfire and lovable Beast Boy. Together they become a team of heroes.

Title: Bhediya
Cast: Director:, Amar Kaushik, | ,     Stars:, Varun Dhawan, , Kriti Sanon, , Abhishek Banerjee, , Deepak Dobriyal
Synopsis: Set in the forests of Arunachal, Bhediya is a story of Bhaskar, a man who gets bitten by a wolf, and begins to transform into the creature. As Bhaskar and his buddies try to find answers, a bunch of twists, turns, and laughs ensue.

Title: Ghosts
Cast: Stars:, Rose McIver, , Utkarsh Ambudkar, , Brandon Scott Jones, , Danielle Pinnock
Synopsis: A young couple's dreams come true when they inherit a beautiful country house, only to find it's both falling apart and inhabited by many of the deceased previous residents.

Title: Buffy the Vampire Slayer
Cast: Stars:, Sarah Michelle Gellar, , Nicholas Brendon, , Alyson Hannigan, , Anthony Head
Synopsis: A young woman, destined to slay vampires, demons and other infernal creatures, deals with her life fighting evil, with the help of her friends.

Title: Thor: Love and Thunder
Cast: Director:, Taika Waititi, | ,     Stars:, Chris Hemsworth, , Natalie Portman, , Christian Bale, , Tessa Thompson
Synopsis: Thor enlists the help of Valkyrie, Korg and ex-girlfriend Jane Foster to fight Gorr the God Butcher, who intends to make the gods extinct.

Title: The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power
Cast: Stars:, Morfydd Clark, , Ismael Cruz Cordova, , Charlie Vickers, , Markella Kavenagh
Synopsis: Epic drama set thousands of years before the events of J.R.R. Tolkien's 'The Hobbit' and 'The Lord of the Rings' follows an ensemble cast of characters, both familiar and new, as they confront the long-feared re-emergence of evil to Middle-earth.

Title: Shadow and Bone
Cast: Stars:, Jessie Mei Li, , Ben Barnes, , Archie Renaux, , Freddy Carter
Synopsis: Dark forces conspire against orphan mapmaker Alina Starkov when she unleashes an extraordinary power that could change the fate of her war-torn world.

Title: Violent Night
Cast: Director:, Tommy Wirkola, | ,     Stars:, David Harbour, , John Leguizamo, , Beverly D'Angelo, , Alex Hassell
Synopsis: When a group of mercenaries attack the estate of a wealthy family, Santa Claus must step in to save the day (and Christmas).

Title: Star Wars: The Clone Wars
Cast: Stars:, Tom Kane, , Dee Bradley Baker, , Matt Lanter, , James Arnold Taylor
Synopsis: Jedi Knights lead the Grand Army of the Republic against the droid army of the Separatists.

Title: Once Upon a Time
Cast: Stars:, Ginnifer Goodwin, , Jennifer Morrison, , Lana Parrilla, , Robert Carlyle
Synopsis: A young woman with a troubled past is drawn to a small town in Maine where fairy tales are to be believed.

Title: The Little Mermaid
Cast: Director:, Rob Marshall, | ,     Stars:, Halle Bailey, , Jonah Hauer-King, , Melissa McCarthy, , Javier Bardem
Synopsis: A young mermaid makes a deal with a sea witch to trade her beautiful voice for human legs so she can discover the world above water and impress a prince.

Title: Spider-Man: Across the Spider-Verse
Cast: Directors:, Joaquim Dos Santos, , Kemp Powers, , Justin K. Thompson, | ,     Stars:, Shameik Moore, , Hailee Steinfeld, , Brian Tyree Henry, , Luna Lauren Velez
Synopsis: Miles Morales catapults across the Multiverse, where he encounters a team of Spider-People charged with protecting its very existence. When the heroes clash on how to handle a new threat, Miles must redefine what it means to be a hero.

Title: Dungeons & Dragons: Honor Among Thieves
Cast: Directors:, John Francis Daley, , Jonathan Goldstein, | ,     Stars:, Chris Pine, , Michelle Rodriguez, , Regé-Jean Page, , Justice Smith
Synopsis: A charming thief and a band of unlikely adventurers embark on an epic quest to retrieve a lost relic, but things go dangerously awry when they run afoul of the wrong people.

Title: The Super Mario Bros. Movie
Cast: Directors:, Aaron Horvath, , Michael Jelenic, , Pierre Leduc, , Fabien Polack, | ,     Stars:, Chris Pratt, , Anya Taylor-Joy, , Charlie Day, , Jack Black
Synopsis: A plumber named Mario travels through an underground labyrinth with his brother, Luigi, trying to save a captured princess.

Title: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
Cast: Directors:, Bob Persichetti, , Peter Ramsey, , Rodney Rothman, | ,     Stars:, Shameik Moore, , Jake Johnson, , Hailee Steinfeld, , Mahershala Ali
Synopsis: Teen Miles Morales becomes the Spider-Man of his universe and must join with five spider-powered individuals from other dimensions to stop a threat for all realities.

Title: Game of Thrones
Cast: Stars:, Emilia Clarke, , Peter Dinklage, , Kit Harington, , Lena Headey
Synopsis: Nine noble families fight for control over the lands of Westeros, while an ancient enemy returns after being dormant for millennia.

Title: Shazam! Fury of the Gods
Cast: Director:, David F. Sandberg, | ,     Stars:, Zachary Levi, , Asher Angel, , Jack Dylan Grazer, , Rachel Zegler
Synopsis: The film continues the story of teenage Billy Batson who, upon reciting the magic word "SHAZAM!" is transformed into his adult Super Hero alter ego, Shazam.

Title: American Born Chinese
Cast: Stars:, Ben Wang, , Yann Yann Yeo, , Chin Han, , Jimmy Liu
Synopsis: Jin Wang is an average teenager balancing high school and home life. When he meets a new foreign student on the first day of the school, even more worlds collide as Jin is unwittingly entangled in a battle with Chinese mythological gods.

Title: Stranger Things
Cast: Stars:, Millie Bobby Brown, , Finn Wolfhard, , Winona Ryder, , David Harbour
Synopsis: When a young boy disappears, his mother, a police chief and his friends must confront terrifying supernatural forces in order to get him back.

Title: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba
Cast: Stars:, Natsuki Hanae, , Zach Aguilar, , Akari Kitô, , Abby Trott
Synopsis: A family is attacked by demons and only two members survive - Tanjiro and his sister Nezuko, who is turning into a demon slowly. Tanjiro sets out to become a demon slayer to avenge his family and cure his sister.

Title: The Mandalorian
Cast: Stars:, Pedro Pascal, , Chris Bartlett, , Katee Sackhoff, , Carl Weathers
Synopsis: The travels of a lone bounty hunter in the outer reaches of the galaxy, far from the authority of the New Republic.

Title: Supernatural
Cast: Stars:, Jared Padalecki, , Jensen Ackles, , Jim Beaver, , Misha Collins
Synopsis: Two brothers follow their father's footsteps as hunters, fighting evil supernatural beings of many kinds, including monsters, demons, and gods that roam the earth.

Title: The Little Mermaid
Cast: Directors:, Ron Clements, , John Musker, | ,     Stars:, Jodi Benson, , Samuel E. Wright, , Rene Auberjonois, , Christopher Daniel Barnes
Synopsis: A mermaid princess makes a Faustian bargain in an attempt to become human and win a prince's love.

Title: Attack on Titan
Cast: Stars:, Josh Grelle, , Bryce Papenbrook, , Yûki Kaji, , Yui Ishikawa
Synopsis: After his hometown is destroyed and his mother is killed, young Eren Jaeger vows to cleanse the earth of the giant humanoid Titans that have brought humanity to the brink of extinction.

Title: One Piece
Cast: Stars:, Mayumi Tanaka, , Laurent Vernin, , Tony Beck, , Akemi Okamura
Synopsis: Follows the adventures of Monkey D. Luffy and his pirate crew in order to find the greatest treasure ever left by the legendary Pirate, Gold Roger. The famous mystery treasure named "One Piece".

Title: Lost
Cast: Stars:, Jorge Garcia, , Josh Holloway, , Yunjin Kim, , Evangeline Lilly
Synopsis: The survivors of a plane crash are forced to work together in order to survive on a seemingly deserted tropical island.

Title: Outlander
Cast: Stars:, Caitríona Balfe, , Sam Heughan, , Sophie Skelton, , Richard Rankin
Synopsis: Claire Beauchamp Randall, a nurse in World War II, mysteriously goes back in time to Scotland in 1743. There, she meets a dashing Highland warrior and gets drawn into an epic rebellion.

Title: Avatar: The Way of Water
Cast: Director:, James Cameron, | ,     Stars:, Sam Worthington, , Zoe Saldana, , Sigourney Weaver, , Stephen Lang
Synopsis: Jake Sully lives with his newfound family formed on the extrasolar moon Pandora. Once a familiar threat returns to finish what was previously started, Jake must work with Neytiri and the army of the Na'vi race to protect their home.

Title: Renfield
Cast: Director:, Chris McKay, | ,     Stars:, Nicholas Hoult, , Nicolas Cage, , Awkwafina, , Ben Schwartz
Synopsis: Renfield, Dracula's henchman and inmate at the lunatic asylum for decades, longs for a life away from the Count, his various demands, and all of the bloodshed that comes with them.

Title: Everything Everywhere All at Once
Cast: Directors:, Daniel Kwan, , Daniel Scheinert, | ,     Stars:, Michelle Yeoh, , Stephanie Hsu, , Jamie Lee Curtis, , Ke Huy Quan

Title: House of the Dragon

Synopsis: Geralt of Rivia, a solitary monster hunter, struggles to find his place in a world where people often prove more wicked than beasts.

Synopsis: A coming-of-age joyride about Cootie, a 13-foot-tall man, who escapes to experience the beauty and contradictions of the real world; he forms friendships, finds love, navigates awkward situations, and encounters his idol named The Hero.

Title: Sweet Tooth
Cast: Stars:, Nonso Anozie, , Christian Convery, , Adeel Akhtar, , Stefania LaVie Owen
Synopsis: A boy who is half human and half deer survives in a post-apocalyptic world with other hybrids.

Title: Elemental
Cast: Director:, Peter Sohn, | ,     Stars:, Leah Lewis, , Mamoudou Athie, , Ronnie Del Carmen, , Shila Ommi
Synopsis: Follows Ember and Wade, in a city where fire-, water-, land- and air-residents live together.

Title: Wednesday
Cast: Stars:, Jenna Ortega, , Hunter Doohan, , Percy Hynes White, , Emma Myers
Synopsis: Follows Wednesday Addams' years as a student, when she attempts to master her emerging psychic ability, thwart a killing spree, and solve the mystery that embroiled her parents.

Title: Der Greif
Cast: Stars:, Jeremias Meyer, , Zoran Pingel, , Lea Drinda, , Sabine Timoteo
Synopsis: Based on the fantasy bestseller. To save humanity from the Gryphon's claws, outcast Mark must confront his family's dark legacy and enter a deadly battle in the parallel world of the Black Tower.

Title: Three Thousand Years of Longing
Cast: Director:, George Miller, | ,     Stars:, Tilda Swinton, , Idris Elba, , Erdil Yasaroglu, , Sarah Houbolt
Synopsis: A lonely scholar, on a trip to Istanbul, discovers a Djinn who offers her three wishes in exchange for his freedom.

Title: Peter Pan & Wendy
Cast: Director:, David Lowery, | ,     Stars:, Alexander Molony, , Ever Anderson, , Jude Law, , Alyssa Wapanatâhk
Synopsis: Follow the adventures of Peter Pan, a boy who does not want to grow up, and how he recruits three siblings in London, and together they embark on a magical adventure on the enchanted island of Neverland.

Title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Cast: Director:, Chris Columbus, | ,     Stars:, Daniel Radcliffe, , Rupert Grint, , Richard Harris, , Maggie Smith
Synopsis: An orphaned boy enrolls in a school of wizardry, where he learns the truth about himself, his family and the terrible evil that haunts the magical world.

Title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
Cast: Director:, Jon Watts, | ,     Stars:, Tom Holland, , Zendaya, , Benedict Cumberbatch, , Jacob Batalon
Synopsis: With Spider-Man's identity now revealed, Peter asks Doctor Strange for help. When a spell goes wrong, dangerous foes from other worlds start to appear, forcing Peter to discover what it truly means to be Spider-Man.

Title: Lucifer
Cast: Stars:, Tom Ellis, , Lauren German, , Kevin Alejandro, , D.B. Woodside
Synopsis: Lucifer Morningstar has decided he's had enough of being the dutiful servant in Hell and decides to spend some time on Earth to better understand humanity. He settles in Los Angeles - the City of Angels.

Title: Shazam!
Cast: Director:, David F. Sandberg, | ,     Stars:, Zachary Levi, , Mark Strong, , Asher Angel, , Jack Dylan Grazer
Synopsis: A newly fostered young boy in search of his mother instead finds unexpected super powers and soon gains a powerful enemy.

Title: The Vampire Diaries
Cast: Stars:, Nina Dobrev, , Paul Wesley, , Ian Somerhalder, , Kat Graham
Synopsis: The lives, loves, dangers and disasters in the town, Mystic Falls, Virginia. Creatures of unspeakable horror lurk beneath this town as a teenage girl is suddenly torn between two vampire brothers.

Title: Titans
Cast: Stars:, Brenton Thwaites, , Anna Diop, , Ryan Potter, , Teagan Croft
Synopsis: Dick and Rachel, a girl possessed by a strange darkness, get embroiled in a conspiracy that could bring Hell on Earth. Joining them along the way are the hot-headed Starfire and lovable Beast Boy. Together they become a team of heroes.

Title: Bhediya
Cast: Director:, Amar Kaushik, | ,     Stars:, Varun Dhawan, , Kriti Sanon, , Abhishek Banerjee, , Deepak Dobriyal
Synopsis: Set in the forests of Arunachal, Bhediya is a story of Bhaskar, a man who gets bitten by a wolf, and begins to transform into the creature. As Bhaskar and his buddies try to find answers, a bunch of twists, turns, and laughs ensue.

Title: Ghosts
Cast: Stars:, Rose McIver, , Utkarsh Ambudkar, , Brandon Scott Jones, , Danielle Pinnock
Synopsis: A young couple's dreams come true when they inherit a beautiful country house, only to find it's both falling apart and inhabited by many of the deceased previous residents.

Title: Buffy the Vampire Slayer
Cast: Stars:, Sarah Michelle Gellar, , Nicholas Brendon, , Alyson Hannigan, , Anthony Head
Synopsis: A young woman, destined to slay vampires, demons and other infernal creatures, deals with her life fighting evil, with the help of her friends.

Title: Thor: Love and Thunder
Cast: Director:, Taika Waititi, | ,     Stars:, Chris Hemsworth, , Natalie Portman, , Christian Bale, , Tessa Thompson
Synopsis: Thor enlists the help of Valkyrie, Korg and ex-girlfriend Jane Foster to fight Gorr the God Butcher, who intends to make the gods extinct.

Title: The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power
Cast: Stars:, Morfydd Clark, , Ismael Cruz Cordova, , Charlie Vickers, , Markella Kavenagh
Synopsis: Epic drama set thousands of years before the events of J.R.R. Tolkien's 'The Hobbit' and 'The Lord of the Rings' follows an ensemble cast of characters, both familiar and new, as they confront the long-feared re-emergence of evil to Middle-earth.

Title: Shadow and Bone

Synopsis: Jedi Knights lead the Grand Army of the Republic against the droid army of the Separatists.

Synopsis: A young woman with a troubled past is drawn to a small town in Maine where fairy tales are to be believed.

Cast: Director:, Rob Marshall, | ,     Stars:, Halle Bailey, , Jonah Hauer-King, , Melissa McCarthy, , Javier Bardem

Synopsis: With Spider-Man's identity now revealed, Peter asks Doctor Strange for help. When a spell goes wrong, dangerous foes from other worlds start to appear, forcing Peter to discover what it truly means to be Spider-Man.

Synopsis: A newly fostered young boy in search of his mother instead finds unexpected super powers and soon gains a powerful enemy.

Title: The Vampire Diaries
Cast: Stars:, Nina Dobrev, , Paul Wesley, , Ian Somerhalder, , Kat Graham
Synopsis: The lives, loves, dangers and disasters in the town, Mystic Falls, Virginia. Creatures of unspeakable horror lurk beneath this town as a teenage girl is suddenly torn between two vampire brothers.

Title: Titans

Synopsis: Dick and Rachel, a girl possessed by a strange darkness, get embroiled in a conspiracy that could bring Hell on Earth. Joining them along the way are the hot-headed Starfire and lovable Beast Boy. Together they become a team of heroes.

Title: Bhediya
Cast: Director:, Amar Kaushik, | ,     Stars:, Varun Dhawan, , Kriti Sanon, , Abhishek Banerjee, , Deepak Dobriyal
Synopsis: Set in the forests of Arunachal, Bhediya is a story of Bhaskar, a man who gets bitten by a wolf, and begins to transform into the creature. As Bhaskar and his buddies try to find answers, a bunch of twists, turns, and laughs ensue.

Title: Ghosts
Cast: Stars:, Rose McIver, , Utkarsh Ambudkar, , Brandon Scott Jones, , Danielle Pinnock
Synopsis: A young couple's dreams come true when they inherit a beautiful country house, only to find it's both falling apart and inhabited by many of the deceased previous residents.

Title: Buffy the Vampire Slayer
Cast: Stars:, Sarah Michelle Gellar, , Nicholas Brendon, , Alyson Hannigan, , Anthony Head
Synopsis: A young woman, destined to slay vampires, demons and other infernal creatures, deals with her life fighting evil, with the help of her friends.

Synopsis: A family is attacked by demons and only two members survive - Tanjiro and his sister Nezuko, who is turning into a demon slowly. Tanjiro sets out to become a demon slayer to avenge his family and cure his sister.

Title: The Mandalorian
Cast: Stars:, Pedro Pascal, , Chris Bartlett, , Katee Sackhoff, , Carl Weathers
Synopsis: The travels of a lone bounty hunter in the outer reaches of the galaxy, far from the authority of the New Republic.

Title: Supernatural
Cast: Stars:, Jared Padalecki, , Jensen Ackles, , Jim Beaver, , Misha Collins
Synopsis: Two brothers follow their father's footsteps as hunters, fighting evil supernatural beings of many kinds, including monsters, demons, and gods that roam the earth.

Title: The Little Mermaid
Cast: Directors:, Ron Clements, , John Musker, | ,     Stars:, Jodi Benson, , Samuel E. Wright, , Rene Auberjonois, , Christopher Daniel Barnes
Synopsis: A mermaid princess makes a Faustian bargain in an attempt to become human and win a prince's love.

Title: Attack on Titan
Cast: Stars:, Josh Grelle, , Bryce Papenbrook, , Yûki Kaji, , Yui Ishikawa
Synopsis: After his hometown is destroyed and his mother is killed, young Eren Jaeger vows to cleanse the earth of the giant humanoid Titans that have brought humanity to the brink of extinction.

Title: One Piece
Cast: Stars:, Mayumi Tanaka, , Laurent Vernin, , Tony Beck, , Akemi Okamura
Synopsis: Follows the adventures of Monkey D. Luffy and his pirate crew in order to find the greatest treasure ever left by the legendary Pirate, Gold Roger. The famous mystery treasure named "One Piece".

Title: Lost
Cast: Stars:, Jorge Garcia, , Josh Holloway, , Yunjin Kim, , Evangeline Lilly
Synopsis: The survivors of a plane crash are forced to work together in order to survive on a seemingly deserted tropical island.

Title: Outlander
Cast: Stars:, Caitríona Balfe, , Sam Heughan, , Sophie Skelton, , Richard Rankin
Synopsis: Claire Beauchamp Randall, a nurse in World War II, mysteriously goes back in time to Scotland in 1743. There, she meets a dashing Highland warrior and gets drawn into an epic rebellion.

Title: Avatar: The Way of Water
Cast: Director:, James Cameron, | ,     Stars:, Sam Worthington, , Zoe Saldana, , Sigourney Weaver, , Stephen Lang
Synopsis: Jake Sully lives with his newfound family formed on the extrasolar moon Pandora. Once a familiar threat returns to finish what was previously started, Jake must work with Neytiri and the army of the Na'vi race to protect their home.

Title: Renfield
Cast: Director:, Chris McKay, | ,     Stars:, Nicholas Hoult, , Nicolas Cage, , Awkwafina, , Ben Schwartz
Synopsis: Renfield, Dracula's henchman and inmate at the lunatic asylum for decades, longs for a life away from the Count, his various demands, and all of the bloodshed that comes with them.

Title: Everything Everywhere All at Once
Cast: Directors:, Daniel Kwan, , Daniel Scheinert, | ,     Stars:, Michelle Yeoh, , Stephanie Hsu, , Jamie Lee Curtis, , Ke Huy Quan
Synopsis: A middle-aged Chinese immigrant is swept up into an insane adventure in which she alone can save existence by exploring other universes and connecting with the lives she could have led.

Title: House of the Dragon
Cast: Stars:, Matt Smith, , Graham McTavish, , Steve Toussaint, , Eve Best
Synopsis: An internal succession war within House Targaryen at the height of its power, 172 years before the birth of Daenerys Targaryen.

Title: The Witcher
Cast: Stars:, Henry Cavill, , Freya Allan, , Anya Chalotra, , Mimi Ndiweni
Synopsis: Geralt of Rivia, a solitary monster hunter, struggles to find his place in a world where people often prove more wicked than beasts.

Title: I'm a Virgo
Cast: Stars:, Brett Gray, , Rachel Thurow, , Varsha Chand, , Lindsey G. Smith
Synopsis: A coming-of-age joyride about Cootie, a 13-foot-tall man, who escapes to experience the beauty and contradictions of the real world; he forms friendships, finds love, navigates awkward situations, and encounters his idol named The Hero.

Title: Sweet Tooth
Cast: Stars:, Nonso Anozie, , Christian Convery, , Adeel Akhtar, , Stefania LaVie Owen
Synopsis: A boy who is half human and half deer survives in a post-apocalyptic world with other hybrids.

Title: Elemental
Cast: Director:, Peter Sohn, | ,     Stars:, Leah Lewis, , Mamoudou Athie, , Ronnie Del Carmen, , Shila Ommi
Synopsis: Follows Ember and Wade, in a city where fire-, water-, land- and air-residents live together.

Title: Wednesday
Cast: Stars:, Jenna Ortega, , Hunter Doohan, , Percy Hynes White, , Emma Myers
Synopsis: Follows Wednesday Addams' years as a student, when she attempts to master her emerging psychic ability, thwart a killing spree, and solve the mystery that embroiled her parents.

Title: Der Greif
Cast: Stars:, Jeremias Meyer, , Zoran Pingel, , Lea Drinda, , Sabine Timoteo
Synopsis: Based on the fantasy bestseller. To save humanity from the Gryphon's claws, outcast Mark must confront his family's dark legacy and enter a deadly battle in the parallel world of the Black Tower.

Title: Three Thousand Years of Longing
Cast: Director:, George Miller, | ,     Stars:, Tilda Swinton, , Idris Elba, , Erdil Yasaroglu, , Sarah Houbolt
Synopsis: A lonely scholar, on a trip to Istanbul, discovers a Djinn who offers her three wishes in exchange for his freedom.

Title: Peter Pan & Wendy
Cast: Director:, David Lowery, | ,     Stars:, Alexander Molony, , Ever Anderson, , Jude Law, , Alyssa Wapanatâhk
Synopsis: Follow the adventures of Peter Pan, a boy who does not want to grow up, and how he recruits three siblings in London, and together they embark on a magical adventure on the enchanted island of Neverland.

Title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Cast: Director:, Chris Columbus, | ,     Stars:, Daniel Radcliffe, , Rupert Grint, , Richard Harris, , Maggie Smith
Synopsis: An orphaned boy enrolls in a school of wizardry, where he learns the truth about himself, his family and the terrible evil that haunts the magical world.

Title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
Cast: Director:, Jon Watts, | ,     Stars:, Tom Holland, , Zendaya, , Benedict Cumberbatch, , Jacob Batalon
Synopsis: With Spider-Man's identity now revealed, Peter asks Doctor Strange for help. When a spell goes wrong, dangerous foes from other worlds start to appear, forcing Peter to discover what it truly means to be Spider-Man.

Title: Lucifer
Cast: Stars:, Tom Ellis, , Lauren German, , Kevin Alejandro, , D.B. Woodside
Synopsis: Lucifer Morningstar has decided he's had enough of being the dutiful servant in Hell and decides to spend some time on Earth to better understand humanity. He settles in Los Angeles - the City of Angels.

Title: Shazam!
Cast: Director:, David F. Sandberg, | ,     Stars:, Zachary Levi, , Mark Strong, , Asher Angel, , Jack Dylan Grazer
Synopsis: A newly fostered young boy in search of his mother instead finds unexpected super powers and soon gains a powerful enemy.

Title: The Vampire Diaries
Cast: Stars:, Nina Dobrev, , Paul Wesley, , Ian Somerhalder, , Kat Graham
Synopsis: The lives, loves, dangers and disasters in the town, Mystic Falls, Virginia. Creatures of unspeakable horror lurk beneath this town as a teenage girl is suddenly torn between two vampire brothers.

Title: Titans
Cast: Stars:, Brenton Thwaites, , Anna Diop, , Ryan Potter, , Teagan Croft
Synopsis: Dick and Rachel, a girl possessed by a strange darkness, get embroiled in a conspiracy that could bring Hell on Earth. Joining them along the way are the hot-headed Starfire and lovable Beast Boy. Together they become a team of heroes.

Title: Bhediya
Cast: Director:, Amar Kaushik, | ,     Stars:, Varun Dhawan, , Kriti Sanon, , Abhishek Banerjee, , Deepak Dobriyal
Synopsis: Set in the forests of Arunachal, Bhediya is a story of Bhaskar, a man who gets bitten by a wolf, and begins to transform into the creature. As Bhaskar and his buddies try to find answers, a bunch of twists, turns, and laughs ensue.

Title: Ghosts
Cast: Stars:, Rose McIver, , Utkarsh Ambudkar, , Brandon Scott Jones, , Danielle Pinnock
Synopsis: A young couple's dreams come true when they inherit a beautiful country house, only to find it's both falling apart and inhabited by many of the deceased previous residents.

Title: Buffy the Vampire Slayer
Cast: Stars:, Sarah Michelle Gellar, , Nicholas Brendon, , Alyson Hannigan, , Anthony Head
Synopsis: A young woman, destined to slay vampires, demons and other infernal creatures, deals with her life fighting evil, with the help of her friends.

Synopsis: Thor enlists the help of Valkyrie, Korg and ex-girlfriend Jane Foster to fight Gorr the God Butcher, who intends to make the gods extinct.

Synopsis: Dick and Rachel, a girl possessed by a strange darkness, get embroiled in a conspiracy that could bring Hell on Earth. Joining them along the way are the hot-headed Starfire and lovable Beast Boy. Together they become a team of heroes.

Title: Bhediya
Cast: Director:, Amar Kaushik, | ,     Stars:, Varun Dhawan, , Kriti Sanon, , Abhishek Banerjee, , Deepak Dobriyal
Synopsis: Set in the forests of Arunachal, Bhediya is a story of Bhaskar, a man who gets bitten by a wolf, and begins to transform into the creature. As Bhaskar and his buddies try to find answers, a bunch of twists, turns, and laughs ensue.

Title: Ghosts
Cast: Stars:, Rose McIver, , Utkarsh Ambudkar, , Brandon Scott Jones, , Danielle Pinnock
Synopsis: A young couple's dreams come true when they inherit a beautiful country house, only to find it's both falling apart and inhabited by many of the deceased previous residents.

Title: Buffy the Vampire Slayer
Cast: Stars:, Sarah Michelle Gellar, , Nicholas Brendon, , Alyson Hannigan, , Anthony Head
Synopsis: A young woman, destined to slay vampires, demons and other infernal creatures, deals with her life fighting evil, with the help of her friends.

Title: Thor: Love and Thunder
Cast: Director:, Taika Waititi, | ,     Stars:, Chris Hemsworth, , Natalie Portman, , Christian Bale, , Tessa Thompson
Synopsis: Thor enlists the help of Valkyrie, Korg and ex-girlfriend Jane Foster to fight Gorr the God Butcher, who intends to make the gods extinct.

Title: The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power
Cast: Stars:, Morfydd Clark, , Ismael Cruz Cordova, , Charlie Vickers, , Markella Kavenagh
Synopsis: Epic drama set thousands of years before the events of J.R.R. Tolkien's 'The Hobbit' and 'The Lord of the Rings' follows an ensemble cast of characters, both familiar and new, as they confront the long-feared re-emergence of evil to Middle-earth.

Title: Shadow and Bone
Cast: Stars:, Jessie Mei Li, , Ben Barnes, , Archie Renaux, , Freddy Carter
Synopsis: Dark forces conspire against orphan mapmaker Alina Starkov when she unleashes an extraordinary power that could change the fate of her war-torn world.

Title: Violent Night
Cast: Director:, Tommy Wirkola, | ,     Stars:, David Harbour, , John Leguizamo, , Beverly D'Angelo, , Alex Hassell
Synopsis: When a group of mercenaries attack the estate of a wealthy family, Santa Claus must step in to save the day (and Christmas).

Title: Star Wars: The Clone Wars
Cast: Stars:, Tom Kane, , Dee Bradley Baker, , Matt Lanter, , James Arnold Taylor
Synopsis: Jedi Knights lead the Grand Army of the Republic against the droid army of the Separatists.

Title: Once Upon a Time
Cast: Stars:, Ginnifer Goodwin, , Jennifer Morrison, , Lana Parrilla, , Robert Carlyle
Synopsis: A young woman with a troubled past is drawn to a small town in Maine where fairy tales are to be believed.

Title: The Little Mermaid
Cast: Director:, Rob Marshall, | ,     Stars:, Halle Bailey, , Jonah Hauer-King, , Melissa McCarthy, , Javier Bardem
Synopsis: A young mermaid makes a deal with a sea witch to trade her beautiful voice for human legs so she can discover the world above water and impress a prince.

Title: Spider-Man: Across the Spider-Verse
Cast: Directors:, Joaquim Dos Santos, , Kemp Powers, , Justin K. Thompson, | ,     Stars:, Shameik Moore, , Hailee Steinfeld, , Brian Tyree Henry, , Luna Lauren Velez
Synopsis: Miles Morales catapults across the Multiverse, where he encounters a team of Spider-People charged with protecting its very existence. When the heroes clash on how to handle a new threat, Miles must redefine what it means to be a hero.

Title: Dungeons & Dragons: Honor Among Thieves
Cast: Directors:, John Francis Daley, , Jonathan Goldstein, | ,     Stars:, Chris Pine, , Michelle Rodriguez, , Regé-Jean Page, , Justice Smith
Synopsis: A charming thief and a band of unlikely adventurers embark on an epic quest to retrieve a lost relic, but things go dangerously awry when they run afoul of the wrong people.

Title: The Super Mario Bros. Movie
Cast: Directors:, Aaron Horvath, , Michael Jelenic, , Pierre Leduc, , Fabien Polack, | ,     Stars:, Chris Pratt, , Anya Taylor-Joy, , Charlie Day, , Jack Black
Synopsis: A plumber named Mario travels through an underground labyrinth with his brother, Luigi, trying to save a captured princess.

Title: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
Cast: Directors:, Bob Persichetti, , Peter Ramsey, , Rodney Rothman, | ,     Stars:, Shameik Moore, , Jake Johnson, , Hailee Steinfeld, , Mahershala Ali
Synopsis: Teen Miles Morales becomes the Spider-Man of his universe and must join with five spider-powered individuals from other dimensions to stop a threat for all realities.

Title: Game of Thrones
Cast: Stars:, Emilia Clarke, , Peter Dinklage, , Kit Harington, , Lena Headey
Synopsis: Nine noble families fight for control over the lands of Westeros, while an ancient enemy returns after being dormant for millennia.

Title: Shazam! Fury of the Gods
Cast: Director:, David F. Sandberg, | ,     Stars:, Zachary Levi, , Asher Angel, , Jack Dylan Grazer, , Rachel Zegler
Synopsis: The film continues the story of teenage Billy Batson who, upon reciting the magic word "SHAZAM!" is transformed into his adult Super Hero alter ego, Shazam.

Title: American Born Chinese
Cast: Stars:, Ben Wang, , Yann Yann Yeo, , Chin Han, , Jimmy Liu
Synopsis: Jin Wang is an average teenager balancing high school and home life. When he meets a new foreign student on the first day of the school, even more worlds collide as Jin is unwittingly entangled in a battle with Chinese mythological gods.

Title: Stranger Things
Cast: Stars:, Millie Bobby Brown, , Finn Wolfhard, , Winona Ryder, , David Harbour
Synopsis: When a young boy disappears, his mother, a police chief and his friends must confront terrifying supernatural forces in order to get him back.

Title: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba
Cast: Stars:, Natsuki Hanae, , Zach Aguilar, , Akari Kitô, , Abby Trott
Synopsis: A family is attacked by demons and only two members survive - Tanjiro and his sister Nezuko, who is turning into a demon slowly. Tanjiro sets out to become a demon slayer to avenge his family and cure his sister.

Title: The Mandalorian
Cast: Stars:, Pedro Pascal, , Chris Bartlett, , Katee Sackhoff, , Carl Weathers
Synopsis: The travels of a lone bounty hunter in the outer reaches of the galaxy, far from the authority of the New Republic.

Title: Supernatural
Cast: Stars:, Jared Padalecki, , Jensen Ackles, , Jim Beaver, , Misha Collins
Synopsis: Two brothers follow their father's footsteps as hunters, fighting evil supernatural beings of many kinds, including monsters, demons, and gods that roam the earth.

Title: The Little Mermaid
Cast: Directors:, Ron Clements, , John Musker, | ,     Stars:, Jodi Benson, , Samuel E. Wright, , Rene Auberjonois, , Christopher Daniel Barnes
Synopsis: A mermaid princess makes a Faustian bargain in an attempt to become human and win a prince's love.

Title: Attack on Titan
Cast: Stars:, Josh Grelle, , Bryce Papenbrook, , Yûki Kaji, , Yui Ishikawa
Synopsis: After his hometown is destroyed and his mother is killed, young Eren Jaeger vows to cleanse the earth of the giant humanoid Titans that have brought humanity to the brink of extinction.

Title: One Piece
Cast: Stars:, Mayumi Tanaka, , Laurent Vernin, , Tony Beck, , Akemi Okamura
Synopsis: Follows the adventures of Monkey D. Luffy and his pirate crew in order to find the greatest treasure ever left by the legendary Pirate, Gold Roger. The famous mystery treasure named "One Piece".

Title: Lost
Cast: Stars:, Jorge Garcia, , Josh Holloway, , Yunjin Kim, , Evangeline Lilly
Synopsis: The survivors of a plane crash are forced to work together in order to survive on a seemingly deserted tropical island.

Title: Outlander
Cast: Stars:, Caitríona Balfe, , Sam Heughan, , Sophie Skelton, , Richard Rankin
Synopsis: Claire Beauchamp Randall, a nurse in World War II, mysteriously goes back in time to Scotland in 1743. There, she meets a dashing Highland warrior and gets drawn into an epic rebellion.

Title: Avatar: The Way of Water
Cast: Director:, James Cameron, | ,     Stars:, Sam Worthington, , Zoe Saldana, , Sigourney Weaver, , Stephen Lang
Synopsis: Jake Sully lives with his newfound family formed on the extrasolar moon Pandora. Once a familiar threat returns to finish what was previously started, Jake must work with Neytiri and the army of the Na'vi race to protect their home.

Title: Renfield
Cast: Director:, Chris McKay, | ,     Stars:, Nicholas Hoult, , Nicolas Cage, , Awkwafina, , Ben Schwartz
Synopsis: Renfield, Dracula's henchman and inmate at the lunatic asylum for decades, longs for a life away from the Count, his various demands, and all of the bloodshed that comes with them.

Title: Everything Everywhere All at Once
Cast: Directors:, Daniel Kwan, , Daniel Scheinert, | ,     Stars:, Michelle Yeoh, , Stephanie Hsu, , Jamie Lee Curtis, , Ke Huy Quan

Title: House of the Dragon

Synopsis: Geralt of Rivia, a solitary monster hunter, struggles to find his place in a world where people often prove more wicked than beasts.

Synopsis: A coming-of-age joyride about Cootie, a 13-foot-tall man, who escapes to experience the beauty and contradictions of the real world; he forms friendships, finds love, navigates awkward situations, and encounters his idol named The Hero.

Title: Sweet Tooth
Cast: Stars:, Nonso Anozie, , Christian Convery, , Adeel Akhtar, , Stefania LaVie Owen
Synopsis: A boy who is half human and half deer survives in a post-apocalyptic world with other hybrids.

Title: Elemental
Cast: Director:, Peter Sohn, | ,     Stars:, Leah Lewis, , Mamoudou Athie, , Ronnie Del Carmen, , Shila Ommi
Synopsis: Follows Ember and Wade, in a city where fire-, water-, land- and air-residents live together.

Title: Wednesday
Cast: Stars:, Jenna Ortega, , Hunter Doohan, , Percy Hynes White, , Emma Myers
Synopsis: Follows Wednesday Addams' years as a student, when she attempts to master her emerging psychic ability, thwart a killing spree, and solve the mystery that embroiled her parents.

Title: Der Greif
Cast: Stars:, Jeremias Meyer, , Zoran Pingel, , Lea Drinda, , Sabine Timoteo
Synopsis: Based on the fantasy bestseller. To save humanity from the Gryphon's claws, outcast Mark must confront his family's dark legacy and enter a deadly battle in the parallel world of the Black Tower.

Title: Three Thousand Years of Longing
Cast: Director:, George Miller, | ,     Stars:, Tilda Swinton, , Idris Elba, , Erdil Yasaroglu, , Sarah Houbolt
Synopsis: A lonely scholar, on a trip to Istanbul, discovers a Djinn who offers her three wishes in exchange for his freedom.

Title: Peter Pan & Wendy
Cast: Director:, David Lowery, | ,     Stars:, Alexander Molony, , Ever Anderson, , Jude Law, , Alyssa Wapanatâhk
Synopsis: Follow the adventures of Peter Pan, a boy who does not want to grow up, and how he recruits three siblings in London, and together they embark on a magical adventure on the enchanted island of Neverland.

Title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Cast: Director:, Chris Columbus, | ,     Stars:, Daniel Radcliffe, , Rupert Grint, , Richard Harris, , Maggie Smith
Synopsis: An orphaned boy enrolls in a school of wizardry, where he learns the truth about himself, his family and the terrible evil that haunts the magical world.

Title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
Cast: Director:, Jon Watts, | ,     Stars:, Tom Holland, , Zendaya, , Benedict Cumberbatch, , Jacob Batalon
Synopsis: With Spider-Man's identity now revealed, Peter asks Doctor Strange for help. When a spell goes wrong, dangerous foes from other worlds start to appear, forcing Peter to discover what it truly means to be Spider-Man.

Title: Lucifer
Cast: Stars:, Tom Ellis, , Lauren German, , Kevin Alejandro, , D.B. Woodside
Synopsis: Lucifer Morningstar has decided he's had enough of being the dutiful servant in Hell and decides to spend some time on Earth to better understand humanity. He settles in Los Angeles - the City of Angels.

Title: Shazam!
Cast: Director:, David F. Sandberg, | ,     Stars:, Zachary Levi, , Mark Strong, , Asher Angel, , Jack Dylan Grazer
Synopsis: A newly fostered young boy in search of his mother instead finds unexpected super powers and soon gains a powerful enemy.

Title: The Vampire Diaries
Cast: Stars:, Nina Dobrev, , Paul Wesley, , Ian Somerhalder, , Kat Graham
Synopsis: The lives, loves, dangers and disasters in the town, Mystic Falls, Virginia. Creatures of unspeakable horror lurk beneath this town as a teenage girl is suddenly torn between two vampire brothers.

Title: Titans
Cast: Stars:, Brenton Thwaites, , Anna Diop, , Ryan Potter, , Teagan Croft
Synopsis: Dick and Rachel, a girl possessed by a strange darkness, get embroiled in a conspiracy that could bring Hell on Earth. Joining them along the way are the hot-headed Starfire and lovable Beast Boy. Together they become a team of heroes.

Title: Bhediya
Cast: Director:, Amar Kaushik, | ,     Stars:, Varun Dhawan, , Kriti Sanon, , Abhishek Banerjee, , Deepak Dobriyal
Synopsis: Set in the forests of Arunachal, Bhediya is a story of Bhaskar, a man who gets bitten by a wolf, and begins to transform into the creature. As Bhaskar and his buddies try to find answers, a bunch of twists, turns, and laughs ensue.

Title: Ghosts
Cast: Stars:, Rose McIver, , Utkarsh Ambudkar, , Brandon Scott Jones, , Danielle Pinnock
Synopsis: A young couple's dreams come true when they inherit a beautiful country house, only to find it's both falling apart and inhabited by many of the deceased previous residents.

Title: Buffy the Vampire Slayer
Cast: Stars:, Sarah Michelle Gellar, , Nicholas Brendon, , Alyson Hannigan, , Anthony Head
Synopsis: A young woman, destined to slay vampires, demons and other infernal creatures, deals with her life fighting evil, with the help of her friends.

Title: Thor: Love and Thunder
Cast: Director:, Taika Waititi, | ,     Stars:, Chris Hemsworth, , Natalie Portman, , Christian Bale, , Tessa Thompson
Synopsis: Thor enlists the help of Valkyrie, Korg and ex-girlfriend Jane Foster to fight Gorr the God Butcher, who intends to make the gods extinct.

Title: The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power
Cast: Stars:, Morfydd Clark, , Ismael Cruz Cordova, , Charlie Vickers, , Markella Kavenagh
Synopsis: Epic drama set thousands of years before the events of J.R.R. Tolkien's 'The Hobbit' and 'The Lord of the Rings' follows an ensemble cast of characters, both familiar and new, as they confront the long-feared re-emergence of evil to Middle-earth.

Title: Shadow and Bone

Synopsis: Jedi Knights lead the Grand Army of the Republic against the droid army of the Separatists.

Synopsis: A young woman with a troubled past is drawn to a small town in Maine where fairy tales are to be believed.

Cast: Director:, Rob Marshall, | ,     Stars:, Halle Bailey, , Jonah Hauer-King, , Melissa McCarthy, , Javier Bardem

Synopsis: With Spider-Man's identity now revealed, Peter asks Doctor Strange for help. When a spell goes wrong, dangerous foes from other worlds start to appear, forcing Peter to discover what it truly means to be Spider-Man.

Synopsis: A newly fostered young boy in search of his mother instead finds unexpected super powers and soon gains a powerful enemy.

Title: The Vampire Diaries
Cast: Stars:, Nina Dobrev, , Paul Wesley, , Ian Somerhalder, , Kat Graham
Synopsis: The lives, loves, dangers and disasters in the town, Mystic Falls, Virginia. Creatures of unspeakable horror lurk beneath this town as a teenage girl is suddenly torn between two vampire brothers.

Title: Titans

Synopsis: Dick and Rachel, a girl possessed by a strange darkness, get embroiled in a conspiracy that could bring Hell on Earth. Joining them along the way are the hot-headed Starfire and lovable Beast Boy. Together they become a team of heroes.

Title: Bhediya
Cast: Director:, Amar Kaushik, | ,     Stars:, Varun Dhawan, , Kriti Sanon, , Abhishek Banerjee, , Deepak Dobriyal
Synopsis: Set in the forests of Arunachal, Bhediya is a story of Bhaskar, a man who gets bitten by a wolf, and begins to transform into the creature. As Bhaskar and his buddies try to find answers, a bunch of twists, turns, and laughs ensue.

Title: Ghosts
Cast: Stars:, Rose McIver, , Utkarsh Ambudkar, , Brandon Scott Jones, , Danielle Pinnock
Synopsis: A young couple's dreams come true when they inherit a beautiful country house, only to find it's both falling apart and inhabited by many of the deceased previous residents.

Title: Buffy the Vampire Slayer
Cast: Stars:, Sarah Michelle Gellar, , Nicholas Brendon, , Alyson Hannigan, , Anthony Head
Synopsis: A young woman, destined to slay vampires, demons and other infernal creatures, deals with her life fighting evil, with the help of her friends.
